author: cms-AlCaDB
body:
#### PR description:

PR #38692 has changed the default Beam Spot in the Run-3 Global Tag , which is now out-of-synch with the vertex smearing assumed for the Run-3  RelVal workflows, even if it is correct for the 2022 physics MC.
This PR fixes the problem by making `Realistic25ns13p6TeVEarly2022Collision` the default for Run-3 relval workflows and wherever it is necessary to change it in standalone configurations and reverting the revert of PR #38692  (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38762#issuecomment-1185848077)

## Port of the original description of #38692 from @francescobrivio 

In this PR we add:
   * the new GEM Alignment and AlignmentErrors tags to all Run3 GTs ([CMSTalk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/full-track-validation-hlt-express-prompt-update-of-mual/12237))
        * In order to be consistent with these new tags (and with the GEM geometry already in use in HLT/Express/Prompt), the data and data_relval GTs have also been updated with the latest GEMRECO_Geometry tag (from v2 to v3)
   * the new BeamSpot for Run 3 collisions at 13.6 TeV in all Run3 MC GTs
        * Compatible with the VtxSmearing parameters Realistic25ns13p6TeVEarly2022Collision introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38616
        The new reco BeamSpot was derived from the RelVal produced in [JIRA-PDMVRELVALS-156](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/PDMVRELVALS-156)
   * new DroboxMetaData tag for the Express and Prompt frozen GTs and in the data and data_relval GTs ([CMSTalk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/new-dropbox-meta-data-tag-for-express-for-12-4-x/12176))

The new GEM tags are:
`GEMAlignment_hlt_v2`
`GEMAlignment_express_v2`
`GEMAlignment_prompt_v2`
`GEMAlignment_v2`
`GEMAlignment_MC_v1`
`GEMAlignment_ideal_MC_v1`

`GEMAlignmentErrorExtended_6x6_hlt_v2`
`GEMAlignmentErrorExtended_6x6_express_v2`
`GEMAlignmentErrorExtended_6x6_prompt_v2`
`GEMAlignmentErrorExtended_6x6_v2`
`GEMAlignmentErrorExtended_6x6_MC_v1`
`GEMAlignmentErrorExtended_6x6_ideal_MC_v1`

The GEMRECO geometry tag is:
`GEMRECO_Geometry_v3_hlt`

The new BeamSpot tags are:
`BeamSpotObjects_Realistic25ns_13p6TeVCollisions_Early2022_v1_mc`
`BeamSpotOnlineObjects_Realistic25ns_13p6TeVCollisions_Early2022_v1_mc`

The new DMD tag is:
`DropBoxMetadata_v8_express`

GT Diffs:
   * Frozen HLT https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v4/124X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v6
   * HLT relval https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_dataRun3_HLT_relval_v6/124X_dataRun3_HLT_relval_v8
   * Frozen Express https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_dataRun3_Express_frozen_v2/124X_dataRun3_Express_frozen_v4
   * Frozen Prompt https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_dataRun3_Prompt_frozen_v2/124X_dataRun3_Prompt_frozen_v4
   * Data Run3 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_dataRun3_v5/124X_dataRun3_v9
   * Data Run3 relval https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_dataRun3_relval_v5/124X_dataRun3_relval_v8
   * MC Run3 design https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2022_design_v6/124X_mcRun3_2022_design_v7
   * MC Run3 realistic https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v8/124X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v9
   * MC Run3 cosmics realistic https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_realistic_deco_v9/124X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_realistic_deco_v10
   * MC Run3 cosmics design https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_design_deco_v6/124X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_design_deco_v7
   * MC Run3 realistic HI https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_HI_v8/124X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_HI_v9
   * MC Run3 2023 realistic https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v9/124X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v10
   * MC Run3 2024 realistic https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v9/124X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v10
   * Open HLT https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_dataRun3_HLT_v3/124X_dataRun3_HLT_v4
   * Open Express https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_dataRun3_Express_v3/124X_dataRun3_Express_v4
   * Open Prompt https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_dataRun3_Prompt_v3/124X_dataRun3_Prompt_v4

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A

cc:
@cms-sw/alca-l2
title: Add GEM alignment in all Run3 GTs and update BeamSpot in Run3 MC GTs + swap `Run3RoundOptics25ns13TeVLowSigmaZ` with `Realistic25ns13p6TeVEarly2022Collision` vtx smearing
